data.card_title: Cod with cucumber, avocado & mango salsa salad
data.card_desc: If you're looking for a healthy lunch bursting with the colours and flavours of summer, this delicious cod, avocado and mango salad is low in fat and calories
Combine the rich flavours of balsamic and beetroot in a healthy beef dish that feels indulgent yet is low fat, low calorie and contains three of your five-a-day
Mix oranges with beetroot and mint in a vegetarian grain salad that looks as good as it tastes. Made in just 10 minutes, it's a perfect packed lunch
Liven up leftover pork by combining with bulgur wheat, curry powder, cumin seeds and spring onions to make a salad that is healthy yet packed full of flavour

data.card_title: Veggie olive wraps with mustard vinaigrette
data.card_desc: Eat the rainbow with our simple, healthy, veggie wrap. This olive and veg sandwich makes an easy vegan, low-calorie lunch option to eat al-desko
This simple healthy supper can be on the table in 15 minutes flat. Treat yourself to baked eggs, a hearty red pepper sauce and a chunk of ciabatta

data.card_title: Leek & butter bean soup with crispy kale & bacon
data.card_desc: Butter beans give this dairy-free, healthy soup a creamy texture and the starchy liquid from the can helps to thicken it into a comforting supper
An easy-to-prepare midweek one-pot with cod fillet, chickpeas, ginger and spices - it's healthy, low calorie and packed with iron too.
This traditional Spanish take on ratatouille uses delicious seasonal ingredients. Serve with country-style bread and fruity red wine
A rescue recipe for when there's nothing in the fridge, or when you fancy something cheap, delicious and filling
Quick, easy and packed with healthy veg, this is a great midweek meal for vegans and veggies

data.card_title: Omelette pancakes with tomato & pepper sauce
data.card_desc: Healthy, low-calorie and gluten-free - these herby egg 'pancakes' will become your go-to favourite for a quick midweek meal
Low-fat and warming, this bean and vegetable soup makes a healthy lunch or dinner - for even more nutrients, top with sliced almonds

data.card_title: Smoky aubergine tagine with lemon & apricots
data.card_desc: A fragrant tagine is perfect for summer entertaining, lighter than stew but just as satisfying with meaty aubergines and aromatic spices

data.card_title: Spiced black bean & chicken soup with kale
data.card_desc: Use up leftover roast or ready-cooked chicken in this healthy and warming soup, spiced with cumin and chilli

data.card_title: Pan-cooked feta with beetroot salsa & bean mash
data.card_desc: Whip up this budget vegetarian dinner in minutes - pile slices of light feta onto cannellini bean mash and top with tangy beetroot salsa

data.card_title: Smoky mushroom burgers with roasted garlic mayo
data.card_desc: Top mushrooms with sundried tomato breadcrumbs and serve with melted cheese and aioli for the ultimate veggie burger

data.card_title: Vegetarian chilli-stuffed peppers with feta topping
data.card_desc: A satisfying vegetarian supper that packs in 4 of your 5-a-day. Stuff peppers with cream cheese, beans, aubergine and feta
A fresh and healthy Asian-style salad with Thai basil and coriander, soya beans, carrots and tomatoes
A new take on the classic salad Niçoise. This lean salad is bulked out by storecupboard cannellini beans and flavoured with dill and lemon

data.card_title: Runner bean, smoked trout & potato salad
data.card_desc: Showcase seasonal ingredients in this simple salad of delicate fish, new potatoes and beans in a mustard and horseradish vinaigrette
You can't beat this low-fat, one-pot recipe for an easy meal, bursting with summer colour and flavour
